classes

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Conversation

  • public class Conversation
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the messaging system. A Conversation holds information of the conversation partners and the messages within.
    Author:
    johannes

    • Method Detail

      • convertConversationListToJson

        public static javax.json.JsonValue convertConversationListToJson(java.util.List<Conversation> conList)
                                                          throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                                 java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Converts any list of conversations to json
        Parameters:
        conList - - Any list of conversations which have at least id and receiverList set
        Returns:
        {
  "conversationList": [
    {
      "receiverList": [
        {
          "username":"",
          "firstName":"",
          "lastName":"",
          "email":"",
          "emailhash":""
        },
      ]
      "name":"",
      "id":0
    },
  ],
  "successful":true
}
        

        Throws:
        

        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        

        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        getAsJson
        

        public javax.json.JsonValue getAsJson()
                               throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        

        Gets the messages of a conversation as json
        

        

        Returns:
        

        {
  "messageList": [
    {
      "id":0,
      "content":"asdf",
      "sendDate":00000000000,
      "senderID":0
    },
  ],
  "successful": true
}
        

        Throws:
        

        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        

        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
